name: Color Cocktail!
description:
Get ready to mix and pour your way to becoming the ultimate bartender in Color Cocktail! With colorful and addictive gameplay, you'll be challenged to create the perfect drink by matching the color your customers are craving.
Start your bartending adventure and show off your mixing skills to the world!

All of the fanstastic music was done by FrankRawel on Pixabay.

The pixel art text font is Thaleah by Tiny Worlds on the Unity Asset Store.
